swiggy - Assistant Manager - Innovation

Location - Bangalore, Karnataka, India, Work Type: Full Time

Other August 01, 2022

JOB TITLE: Assistant Manager Culinary & Innovation

AREA/DEPARTMENT: Food production, Innovation

JOB LEVEL: 6 REPORTS TO: Senior Manager

POSITIONS SUPERVISED: Sous Chef, CDP, DCDP, Commis

JOB SCOPE:

Work along with the Senior Manager Culinary & Innovation for curating culinary offerings for New Brands - SKU’s Categories. Recipe creation, internal food trials, consumer trials, COG’s, SOP’s and scale-up models to be inline with the present Biz Ops Model. Should be able to curate great dishes with simple ingredients and have an out of the box thought process to provide great Brands consumers love. Should be able to supervise Stealth POD culinary team members and problem solve on CX, quality, SOP’s, CK training, NSO training. Basic exposure to cook chill process

EXPERIENCE

  • Minimum 2 to 3 years of Experience as a Sous Chef in reputed Cloud Kitchen Brands, Standalone Restaurants or Hotels in World Cuisine and exposure in Oriental Cuisine
  • Age requirements below 30 years QUALIFICATIONS /EDUCATION
  • Ability to speak, write, read and understand the primary language. (English & Local language)
  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Management (Preference for Hotel Management or certification from culinary school)
  • Proficient in a variety of technology systems, especially Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Outlook) and able to adapt to new systems quickly.

Responsibilities

  • Ability to curate SKU’s which are innovative, Scale up compliant, COG compliant
  • Ability to plan ahead and come up with offerings with future lens
  • Order materials, supplies, and ingredients based on demand.
  • Supervise kitchen employees and organize food orders - In R&D and Stealth POD’s
  • Oversee the food preparation and cooking process in Stealth Kitchens and CK
  • Recruit and train kitchen employees in designated stations in Stealth POD’s
  • Work with the Stealth Ops incharge for Brand launches and Pilot phase operations
  • Schedule work shifts for employees
  • Store all food products in compliance with health and safety regulations.
  • Ensure the kitchen is clean and organized.
  • Maintain weekly and monthly cost reports
  • Ability to work with vendors to move fast and curate great CX products
  • Maintains comprehensive product knowledge including ingredients, equipment, suppliers, markets and current trends and make appropriate adjustments to kitchen operations accordingly
  • Controls and analyzes, on an on-going basis, the level of the following:
  • Develops with the Training Manager training plans, develops training material in accordance with Bundle Technology PVT LTD guidelines and implements training plans for the Food Production employees and other Food and Beverage employees
  • Work closely with L&D for Ops SOP’s
  • Work closely with QA for shelf life validation, FSSAI compliant practices and Allergen declaration
  • Attends and participates in other meetings & Con Calls as required by the administrative calendar at MEET Google.
  • Keeps an up-dated Swiggy Brand Policies and Procedures file and up-dated files on the following Food Production matters:
  • Recipes ● Finance ● Standards ● Personnel and Training ● Outlets ● Meetings ● Projects ● Material and Equipment ● Miscellaneous

Financial Responsibilities

  • Accurate Recipes with method, Allergen and Yield
  • Trabslation of R&D recipe to bulk recipe

Occupational Health and Safety Responsibilities

  • Demonstrate Awareness of FSSAI policies and procedures and ensure all procedures are conducted safely and within FSSAI guidelines
  • Be aware of duty of care and adhere to occupational, health and safety legislation, policies and procedures
  • Be familiar with property safety, first aid and fire and emergency procedures and operate equipment safely and sensibly
  • Initiate action to correct a hazardous situation and notify supervisors of potential danger.
  • Log security incidents and accidents in accordance with Bundle Technology PVT LTD requirement.

Key Competencies Key Task

Swiggy Values - Believes in them and lives them Drive For Results

Understanding the business

  • Compete against a standard of excellence by setting high performance standards and pursuing aggressive goals
  • Strive for constant improvements and takes responsibility for achieving business results and persevere despite obstacles Understanding the Business
  • Demonstrate an interest in and an understanding of issues relevant to your department and The Brands and keep your knowledge up to date, including legislative information
  • Adheres to Bundle Technology PVT LTD all brands Corporate Code of Conduct, Employee Handbook and Swiggy policies
  • Demonstrates an understanding of competitors’ major strengths and weaknesses
  • Establishes and interprets key performance indicators to manage the business, consistently takes into accounts financial implications of business decisions and recommendations ● Has a broad knowledge of how the business is run, focuses on the major factors necessary to ensure that the business is successful and profitable

Problem Solving and Decision Making

  • Diagnose problems and thoroughly analyze information to guide decision making
  • Evaluate and assimilate critical information when reaching conclusions and make logical, competent decisions

Customer Focus

  • Take action to address these needs in order to exceed their expectations of customer according to their feedbacks.
  • Adhere to The brand standards
  • Maintain a high level of production and packaging knowledge to there team to get 100% CX.
  • Maintain knowledge of special programs and events in the Specific brand in order to recognize and respond to guests needs
  • Maintain current All brand information and brief Team accordingly.
  • Implements procedures which enhance the guest experience

Innovation

  • Generate new ideas and Share with Senior Manager for implementation.
  • Recognize the need for new and modified approaches.

Teamwork

  • Demonstrate cooperation and trust with colleagues, supervisors, teams and across departments to deliver positive results.
  • Actively participate in wider All Swiggy Brand meetings
  • Interact with department and R&D team in a professional and positive manner to foster good rapport, promote team spirit and ensure effective two way communication

Adaptability

  • Be comfortable and effective in an environment of ambiguity or change
  • Be receptive to new ideas and respond to workplace changes in a flexible and optimistic manner
  • Complete tasks as directed by Management or RND Team.

Impact and Influence

  • Promote your ideas persuasively, and shape the opinion of subordinates and overcome resistance
  • Build consensus for action and negotiate mutually beneficial solutions to problems ● Establish influential contacts with suppliers

Leading and Developing People

  • Inspire others to excel by clearly communicating business values and direction, recognizing good performance and providing managerial support
  • Develop potential of others through coaching and development opportunities to build organization capability for the future

Cultural Awareness

  • Understands and takes into account the global nature of the business; works effectively with colleagues from different viewpoints on new food from around the world and also improves on work culture. CONFIDENTIAL & PROPRIETAR

swiggy - Deputy Unit Manager

  • Implement the identified plans for sales increase and also execute the plans laid out by the marketing team to achieve the AOP (Annual Operating Plan) target for the unit and to enhance customer experience.
  • Analyze data to assess the growth of the unit and conduct gap analysis. Review the Daily Sales Report (DSR), the weekly and monthly sales of the unit, and work towards bridging the gaps identified.
  • Establish the organization defined customer service norms within the unit and ensure the complaints are within targets through initiatives such as regular training and process audits.
  • Interact with fleet managers for timely assigning of DEs and for feedback or issues if any.
  • Work with the Catalogue team and/or Cluster manager to ensure correction in menu discrepancies.
  • Responsible for organizing the stock and equipment, ordering supplies and overseeing kitchen maintenance, cleanliness and security.
  • Cross check Indent and ensure availability of all products at all times based on the sales forecasts while ensuring that the unit does not hold excess stock and avoiding spillage.
  • Ensure a proper inventory is maintained and the Goods Received Notes (GRN) process is followed to acertain optimum utilization of resources.
  • Liaise with the Supply Chain Management (SCM) team for decisions on the stock supply. Coordinate with the Chefs to share stock projections (based on Promotions/ Marketing activities) in order to ensure smooth SCM.
  • Review MIS with the Cluster Manager & Unit Chef (Mid Month & Monthly) and maintain MIS reports for income and expenditure of the respective kitchen.
  • Conduct fortnightly audits, maintain an opening and closing checklist to ensure the SOP guidelines, hygiene and safety standard are being followed.
  • Liaise with the Finance team to ensure timely payments to vendors, interactions for inventory management, fluctuations / deviations in expenses and stock levels.
  • Interact with the Food Technologist, R&D Chefs, external auditors etc. to ensure a smooth audit is conducted at the Unit.
  • Track and analyze metrics to ensure reduction in food wastage, food costs, preparation and delivery time to increase opportunities for profitability and customer satisfaction.
  • Ensure all statutory compliances are adhered to at the unit, and plan manpower deployment (Duty Rosters etc.) in line with the productivity and potential output of the unit.
  • Cross check petty cash expenses for the unit and ensure petty cash expenses are reduced.
  • Responsible for orienting, coaching employees and setting expectations for work processes and behaviors. Conduct periodic reviews / daily briefing to ensure team meets expectations.
  • Control attrition by ensuring frequent R&R activities, implementation of incentive plans, periodic training and engagement programmes for the employees.
  • Set up a grievance redressal mechanism for employees to approach in case of any issues. Conduct one-on-one with each team member at least once a month.
  • Ensure conduction of trainings at the unit level to train employees on the SOPs. Groom a few selected employees to take on the responsibilities of the next level.
  • Ensure compliance to all necessary food safety regulations in the unit. Ensure basic hygiene is in place. Identify and implement innovative solutions to aid food safety in the assigned unit.
  • Ensure the safety/ risks are highlighted and safe behavior displayed within the kitchens. Track safety scorecard to correct the near-misses and conduct RCA for safety and to develop corrective action plans.
  • Ensure adherence to the set SOPs across the unit.
  • Work with the Cluster manager to identify process improvement opportunities and implement them for delivering better and faster output in the unit.
